# cancelAllInteractions()

**Instance Method**

Cancels all local and remote interactions. This releases control of all the equipment and rolls back all the actions added to the canceled interaction.

## Declaration

```swift
func cancelAllInteractions()
```

## Canceling interactions

- **cancelInteraction(matching:)**: Cancel the local or remote interaction matching the given identifier. This causes any actions added to it to be rolled back, and releases the controlled equipment and any tossed equipment.
